Package org.wmn4j.io.musicxml

Interface MusicXmlReader

  • public interface MusicXmlReader
    Interface for MusicXML readers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.nio.file.Path SCHEMA
      The path to the local MusicXML schema.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static MusicXmlReader getReader​(boolean validate)
      Returns a reader object with the given configuration.
      Score readScore​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
      Reads the MusicXML file at the path specified by filePath and creates a Score.
      ScoreBuilder scoreBuilderFromFile​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
      Reads the MusicXML file at the path specified by filePath and creates a ScoreBuilder.

    • Field Detail

      • SCHEMA

        static final java.nio.file.Path SCHEMA
        The path to the local MusicXML schema.

    • Method Detail

      • getReader

        static MusicXmlReader getReader​(boolean validate)
        Returns a reader object with the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        validate - specifies whether the returned reader should validate input files for complying to MusicXML schema
        Returns:
        a reader object with the given configuration

      • readScore

        Score readScore​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the MusicXML file at the path specified by filePath and creates a Score.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the MusicXML file.
        Returns:
        Score based on the contents of the MusicXML file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If parsing the file does not succeed.

      • scoreBuilderFromFile

        ScoreBuilder scoreBuilderFromFile​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the MusicXML file at the path specified by filePath and creates a ScoreBuilder. This is intended for the purposes of allowing modifications in memory.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the MusicXML file.
        Returns:
        ScoreBuilder based on the contents of the MusicXML file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If parsing the file does not succeed.
